Accession	Q92731;A8K8K5;G3V5M5;O60608;O60685;O60702;O60703;O75583;O75584;Q0MWT5;Q0MWT6;Q86Z31;Q9UEV6;Q9UHD3;Q9UQK9
EntryName	ESR2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Estrogen receptor beta (ER-beta) (Nuclear receptor subfamily 3 group A member 2)
GeneName	ESR2 ESTRB NR3A2
Length	474
Function	Nuclear hormone receptor. Binds estrogens with an affinity similar to that of ESR1/ER-alpha, and activates expression of reporter genes containing estrogen response elements (ERE) in an estrogen-dependent manner (PubMed:20074560).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
